conversion_verification.notes: The second image shows extruded walls and interior shading, but the camera is essentially pure top-down/orthographic with no meaningful tilt, failing the required angled/isometric cutaway viewing condition.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Auto-rejected due to pure top-down orthographic presentation (mandatory angled-view requirement not met).

detected_errors.description: Second image is rendered from an essentially pure top-down orthographic view rather than an angled/isometric cutaway perspective required for true 3D conversion verification.

summary: Despite having extruded walls, the render is presented in a pure top-down orthographic view, triggering automatic rejection under the strict 3D conversion criteria.
